experience.pageDescription: Explore Ali El Ouankrimi's professional journey - Data Scientist with experience in Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Big Data.
experience.headerTitle: My Journey in Data Science & AI
experience.headerDescription: Passionate about artificial intelligence and data science, I started my journey in 2022 with a software engineering internship. Since then, I have developed my skills in mobile development and specialized in Data Science with Orange Maroc where I won 3rd place at the Orange Summer Challenge 2025.
